localResource.name: Host_Type
localResource.label: Host_Type
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT v3_0_enum_translator_view.value, v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key, 0 as sort FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view, v3_0_host_configuration_view WHERE v3_0_host_configuration_view.host_type = v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key AND v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_type = 'HOST_TYPE' AND v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id in (SELECT v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.cluster_id FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid)) AND v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' THEN v3_0_host_configuration_view.cluster_id ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as uuid) END $P!{active_hosts_select} UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'All', -1, 1 FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view ORDER BY sort DESC, value
